IDs: If enabled, an email is sent to the store owner when a new review is posted

JP: If enabled, an email is sent to the store owner when a new review is posted

JP: If enabled, an email is sent to the store owner when a new comment is posted

IDs: If enabled, an email is sent to the reviewer when the review has been published.

JP: If enabled, an email is sent to the reviewer when the review has been published.

IDs: If enabled, an email is sent to the reviewer when another user leaves a comment on his/her review.
Eng: If enabled, an email is sent to the reviewer when another user leaves a comment on his/her review.
JP: If enabled, an email is sent to the reviewer when another user leaves a comment on his/her review.

IDs: If enabled, an email is automatically sent to your customers a certain number of days after they have made their purchases.
Eng: If enabled, an email is automatically sent to your customers a certain number of days after they have made their purchases.
JP: If enabled, an email is automatically sent to your customers a certain number of days after they have made their purchases.

IDs: This is the number of days the system will wait until sending the Mail After Purchase. 14 days is the recommended threshold.
Eng: This is the number of days the system will wait until sending the Mail After Purchase. 14 days is the recommended threshold.
JP: This is the number of days the system will wait until sending the Mail After Purchase. 14 days is the recommended threshold.

IDs: Set the maximum number of emails sent for orders with multiple products.
Eng: Set the maximum number of emails sent for orders with multiple products.
JP: Set the maximum number of emails sent for orders with multiple products.

IDs: Set the number of days between the sending of each subsequent email for orders with multiple products.
Eng: Set the number of days between the sending of each subsequent email for orders with multiple products.
JP: Set the number of days between the sending of each subsequent email for orders with multiple products.

IDs: Choose to request a review for the most expensive product first, or the product with the least reviews, in orders with multiple products. The 2nd email request will be for the second most expensive product and so on.
Eng: Choose to request a review for the most expensive product first, or the product with the least reviews, in orders with multiple products. The 2nd email request will be for the second most expensive product and so on.
JP: Choose to request a review for the most expensive product first, or the product with the least reviews, in orders with multiple products. The 2nd email request will be for the second most expensive product and so on.

IDs: If enabled, a "Verified Purchase" badge is displayed on the review when the customer has bought the product on your store.

JP: If enabled, a "Verified Purchase" badge is displayed on the review when the customer has bought the product on your store.

IDs: If enabled, the total number of reviews for a product is displayed next to the rating stars on catalog pages

JP: If enabled, the total number of reviews for a product is displayed next to the rating stars on catalog pages
